description: Twist is the cleanest and most stress-free team communication tool I've used. Perfect example of an app that is designed to respect your attention and productivity.
Well, I really think this method of doing things should have been the foundation of every team communication.
free version is limited to 1 month of comments/messages history. No go for me.
After several updates app' icon disappeared from the system. And after latest update I can't login anymore: it doesn't open the app after the browser auth.
summary: Lot of problems in usability and stability

description: The old version of Twist was really great and stable. But they decided to update the tool to make it more "sexy". The usability is completely different and it is a nightmare to use it ! Me and my team are looking for a more usable solution.
Does not even meet the basic standards you could ask for any message app, to send and receive messages
